Song: Every breath you take
Artist: The Police
Composer: Sting
Album: Synchronicity
Tabbed by DJ
21th May 2016

N.B.
This is not the way Sting or Andy Summers play it,
but it is the simplest way of sounding close without
having some wide stretchs for chord shapes.

CAPO: 1st fret (Will then sound in the recorded key of Ab)

Chord names & fret positions are relative to the capo:
[ch]Gadd9[/ch]  = 3x020x    [ch]G/B[/ch]   = x20003    [ch]Eb[/ch] = xx5343
[ch]Emadd9[/ch] = 0240xx    [ch]C[/ch]     = x32010    [ch]F[/ch]  = xx3211
[ch]Csus2[/ch]  = x3553x    [ch]C7/Bb[/ch] = x12010    [ch]G[/ch]  = 320033
[ch]Dsus2[/ch]  = xx0230    [ch]Aadd9[/ch] = x02420

Please select a star rating for this tab, many thanks

==========================================================

content.text:
Title:   Everything I Do (I Do It For You)  (acoustic)
Artist:  Bryan Adams
Albums:  Waking Up the Neighbours (1991), So Far So Good (1993), MTV Unplugged (1997),
         The Best of Me (1999)
Tuning:  Standard Tuning, Capo on First Fret
Tabber:  coolguy824 (coolguy824@excite.com)

Chords to Know: (unless otherwise noted, all chords are to be
played at the 1st fret)
[ch]C[/ch]   [X32010]
[ch]G[/ch]   [320003]
[ch]F[/ch]   [133211]
[ch]Dm[/ch]  [000231]
[ch]Bb[/ch]  [113331]
[ch]Eb[/ch]  [113331] at 6th fret
[ch]Fm[/ch]  [133111]


This song can be played many ways, and with many different arrangements.
The album version is played with two guitars (rhythm and lead), one bass,
drums, and piano. However, I find that
the arrangement of two guitars (one acoustic for rhythm and one electric
for picking), with
percussion (you can't really call it drums, since the percussion in this
version usually only consists of the drummer, Mickey Curry, keeping the
beat with a marraca). The version being tabbed here (the latter version)
is very easy to play, and sounds great. It is in a different key, so it
may sound a little bit different than normal. I hope you enjoy it.


[VERSE I]

[ch]C[/ch]                  [ch]G[/ch]
Look into my eyes, you will see
[ch]F[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]
What you mean to me            
            [ch]C[/ch]                  [ch]G[/ch]
Search your heart, search your soul
             [ch]F[/ch]                     [ch]C[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]
And when you find me there, you'll search no more

      
[CHORUS I]

      [ch]Dm[/ch]                     [ch]C[/ch]      [ch]Dm[/ch]    [ch]C[/ch]
Don't tell me it's not worth trying for
          [ch]Dm[/ch]                     [ch]C[/ch]     [ch]Dm[/ch]
You can't tell me it's not worth dying for
              [ch]C[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]            [ch]C[/ch]
You know it's true, everything I do, I do it for you


[VERSE II]

[ch]C[/ch]                     [ch]G[/ch]
Look into your heart, you will find
        [ch]F[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]
There's nothing there to hide
                  [ch]C[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]
Just take me as I am, take my life
        [ch]F[/ch]                    [ch]C[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]
I would give it all, I would sacrifice


[CHORUS II]

      [ch]Dm[/ch]                     [ch]C[/ch]        [ch]Dm[/ch]    [ch]C[/ch]
Don't tell me it's not worth fighting for
        [ch]Dm[/ch]                       [ch]C[/ch]      [ch]Dm[/ch]
I can't help it, there's nothing I want more
              [ch]C[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]             [ch]C[/ch]
You know it's true, everything I do, I do it for you


[BRIDGE]

[ch]Bb[/ch]                   [ch]Eb[/ch]
There's no love like your love
       [ch]Bb[/ch]               [ch]F[/ch]
And no other could give more love
        [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]
There's nowhere unless you're there
        [ch]D[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]C[/ch]
All the time, all the way, yeah


[INTERLUDE and SOLO]

Rhythm Guitar: [ch]F[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]  [ch]F[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]

Lead Guitar:  This solo is the one that works best with this arrangement, and appears
on the Live at the Budokon DVD.

[CHORUS III]

I can't help it, there's nothing I want more
